summary: A PySide6‑based graphical application that orchestrates the full ANSYS MAPDL workflow, offering tabs for preprocessing (geometry, material, mesh definition) and postprocessing (result visualization with PyVista), while managing model construction, solver execution, and UI lifecycle.
business_intent: Enable engineers to interactively set up, run, and review finite element simulations in ANSYS MAPDL through an intuitive desktop interface, reducing reliance on command‑line scripting and accelerating design analysis.
